summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before the grand jury on September 24, 2020, to testify and produce documents in an investigation into alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and related statutes. The document includes an advice of rights and a request to keep the subpoena confidential.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena and the accompanying letter requesting confidentiality of the investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The unnamed subpoena recipient is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury for the Southern District of New York to testify and produce documents.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is dated and issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, New York
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an investigation into alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421 (transportation for prostitution), 2422 (coercion and enticement), 2423 (transportation of minors), 371 (conspiracy), and 1623 (false declarations before grand jury).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The subpoena commands the recipient to appear on September 24, 2020, at 10:00 a.m., indicating active grand jury proceedings were ongoing at that time.
The document is signed by Audrey Strauss in her capacity as Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.
